vooga.towerdefense.action.actionlist

Class PlayerStatAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.action.Action
      • vooga.towerdefense.action.actionlist.PlayerStatAction

  • public class PlayerStatAction
extends Action
    Action for changing player's score/life/money or any other stat that Player has in a game If the Player class was changed, this needs to be changed.
    Author:
    Zhen Gou
